Advanced Report Generation VIs

Requires: Base Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the Advanced Report Generation VIs to manipulate reports you create in LabVIEW.

The VIs on this palette can return report generation error codes.

Palette ObjectDescription
Append File to ReportAppends the text from a text file into the current report.
Clear ReportClears all text, headers, footers, and formatting information from the report.
Clear Report TextClears the text and related formatting information from the report. This VI does not affect header and footer information.
Get Report SettingsRetrieves information about the current font and text settings of a given report.
Query Available PrintersLists the printers available on the computer, including the default printer in LabVIEW.
Report TypeReturns the report type, such as HTML, of a specified report.
